result.execSummary:
The defendant Kyle D. Schmitt #664501 was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Damage to Property [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
TO BE SERVED IN PRISON
Consecutive to: current sentence.
All court obligations shall be paid directly to Clerk of Court.
Defendant shall pay restitution to Clerk of Courts.
Defendant shall provide a DNA sample.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Kyle D. Schmitt #664501 appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Lisa Riniker in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Steven G. Richards appeared by video for Kyle D. Schmitt #664501. Per agreement, defendant will be pleading to charge. State will recommend 6 months jail consecutive to current sentence, restitution, court costs, and DNA. Defendant is okay with proceeding with sentencing over zoom. Court reviews plea questionnaire and finds defendant freely and knowingly waives rights. Defendant pleads no contest to charge. Court accepts plea and finds defendant guilty. State heard. Attorney Richard heard. Defendant heard on sentencing. Court heard and order 90 days jail consecutive to current sentence to be served in prison, court costs, restitution, and DNA.

Defendant Kyle D. Schmitt #664501 appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Steven G. Richards appeared by phone for Kyle D. Schmitt #664501. Attorney Richards heard on status of the case and requests a plea and sentencing date. Plea and sentencing date set.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 27, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on May 27, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on May 5, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Kyle D. Schmitt #664501 appeared by phone from Fox Lake Correctional.  Attorney Lisa Riniker in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Steven G. Richards not in court. Court has attempted to reach Attorney Richards but has not received a response. Court continues status to a date when Attorney Richards is available. Video appearance will be arranged for defendant from Fox Lake.
Review scheduled for April 1, 2022 at 08:00 am.

Defendant Kyle D. Schmitt #664501 appeared by video, in custody from Fox Lake Correctional,  Attorney Steven G. Richards appeared in court for Kyle D. Schmitt #664501, Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Richards has received a plea offer from the State but has not reviewed that with the defendant. Atty Richards requests a continuance. Status date set.
Status conference scheduled for March 30, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Jury trial scheduled for April 12, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for April 19, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on March 30, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Kyle D. Schmitt #664501 appeared by video from Fox Lake Correctional. Attorney Steven G. Richards appeared in court for Kyle D. Schmitt #664501, Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. appeared in court for State of Wisconsin. Court reviewed complaint, penalties and charges. Atty Richards has been SPD appointed. Verified Address. State does not request bond as Defendant will be incarcerated until at least June. Court agrees. No Bond entered at this time. Defendant waives further readings and enters NG plea. Court accepts plea. Status: 3/2/22 at 2:00 pm, JT week: 3/22/22. Defendant to appear via from Fox Lake.
Status conference scheduled for March 2, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Jury trial scheduled for March 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.
